MIDHANI Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 50 Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 09:51 IST
 Mishtra Dhatu Nigam Limited
 50 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Telangana |  Salary : 29,800 to 32,640




FOLLOW

The Mishra Dhatu Nigam Limited (MIDHANI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 50 Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Electrical, Mechanical Engineering, 10th, and ITI can apply for the MIDHANI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Telangana.

MIDHANI Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Assistant Level-4 & Level-2	50	Diploma in Electrical, Mechanical Engineering, 10th pass, ITI

MIDHANI Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

MIDHANI Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

MIDHANI Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

MIDHANI Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 29,800/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 32.640/- per month.
How to Apply for the MIDHANI Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the MIDHANI Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Carry all the documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

MIDHANI Corporate Office Auditorium, Kanchanbagh, Hyderabad – 500 058.

Important Dates:

Starting date	21-08-2025
Closing date	17-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here

paragraphs: The Mishra Dhatu Nigam Limited (MIDHANI) has announced the notification to fill the vacancies of 50 Assistant Posts. Eligible applicants can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the application deadline. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Electrical, Mechanical Engineering, 10th, and ITI may apply for the MIDHANI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the Direct interview. Details provided include the education details, Age criteria, Selection procedure, Processing fee, salary, and Application process for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.
If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Telangana.
MIDHANI Corporate Office Auditorium, Kanchanbagh, Hyderabad – 500 058.
